laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated ESR level at 57 mm/hr; normal range 0-10 mm/hr
Elevated calprotectin, a sensitive marker for inflammatory bowel disease
Expanding, ground glass lesion involving the left mandible, negative cultures, with associated periosteal reaction and diffuse inflammation
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up CT shows decrease in overall thickness and sclerosis without new lytic lesions or periosteal reaction

laboratory_examinations.date: Follow-up CT scan two months after maintenance indomethacin
laboratory_examinations.findings: Dramatic improvement in right mandible, with minimal cortical thickening and decreased bone expansion
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement remains stable clinically and radiologically almost 3 years later

laboratory_examinations.findings: No inflammatory infiltrate, acute or chronic, and remodeling changes expected in repeat biopsy
